title: John Coltrane - My Favorite Things - Coltrane At Newport [FLAC]
description:
By his 1963 appearance at Newport, John Coltrane had already embraced the sinuous, exploratory modal form that marked his most striking recordings. MY FAVORITE THINGS: COLTRANE AT NEWPORT brings together performances from two of the legendary saxophonist's appearances at the Newport Jazz Festival: one from 1963 and the other from 1965.

Coltrane performs here with his classic quartet: bassist Jimmy Garrison, pianist McCoy Tyner, and drummer Elvin Jones. On the '63 date, Roy Haynes sits in for Jones, and Haynes's effect on the music (he has a lighter touch and is more of a colorist) will strike the ear of those who know this period of Coltrane well. Another stand-out quality is the extended jam on "Impressions", released here for the first time in its entirety.

01.  	I Want To Talk About You (1963 Newport Jazz Festival)	9:41 
02. 	My Favorite Things (1963 Newport Jazz Festival 17:20
03. 	Impressions (1963 Newport Jazz Festival) 23:30

John Coltrane (soprano and tenor saxophones); McCoy Tyner (piano); Jimmy Garrison (bass); Roy Haynes (drums)
Recorded on July 7, 1963, Newport Jazz Festival, Newport, Rhode Island

04. 	Spoken Introduction By Father Norman O'Connor (1965 Newport Jazz Festival) 1:08
05. 	One Down, One Up (1965 Newport Jazz Festival) 12:42
06. 	My Favorite Things (1965 Newport Jazz Festival) 15:14

John Coltrane (soprano and tenor saxophones); McCoy Tyner (piano); Jimmy Garrison (bass); Elvin Jones (drums)
Recorded on July 2, 1965, Newport Jazz Festival, Newport, Rhode Island
